src:
Pelatih Madura United Sanjung Reputasi Arema
07 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rasiman angkat bicara soal Arema FC, yang akan menjadi lawan anak asuhnya pada lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Pelatih Madura United tersebut menilai bahwa Arema merupakan tim besar.
"Arema adalah tim besar, Setiap musim, mereka selalu menjadi tim yang sangat disegani," ucap Rasiman.
"Selain itu, Arema pun pernah bermain di Liga Champions Asia. Artinya, Arema adalah tim yang sangat layak mendapat respek dari semua tim di Indonesia," sambungnya.
Lebih lanjut, Rasiman pun membandingkan reputasi Arema dengan tim besutannya. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab, julukan Madura United, disebutnya saat ini masih dalam proses untuk bisa sekelas Arema.
"Kami masih dalam proses membangun tradisi seperti Arema, dengan segala raihannya selama ini," tutur Rasiman.
Madura United akan menantang Arema FC pada laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Pertandingan, yang akan disiarkan langsung Indosiar, ini akan dihelat di Stadion Kanjuruhan Kabupaten Malang, Jumat (08/11).
Saat ini, Madura United berada di posisi dua klasemen sementara, dengan koleksi 44 angka dari 26 pertandingan. Sementara, Arema berada di peringkat enam klasemen dengan raihan 38 poin dari 25 laga.

Bagaimana Rasiman menakar kekuatan Arema pada musim ini? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Madura United coach praises Arema's reputation
Nov 7 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rasiman spoke about Arema FC, who will be an opponent of foster children in the continued Shopee Liga 1 season 2019. The Madura United coach considered that Arema was a big team.
"Arema is a big team. Every season, they always become a highly respected team," said Rasiman.
"In addition, Arema has also played in the Asian Champions League. That is, Arema is a team that is very worthy of respect from all teams in Indonesia," he continued.
Furthermore, Rasiman also compared Arema's reputation with his team. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab, nicknamed Madura United, said that he was still in the process of being able to be in the same class as Arema.
"We are still in the process of building traditions such as Arema, with all its achievements so far," Rasiman said.
Madura United will challenge Arema FC in the 27th week of Shopee League 1 match of the 2019 season. The match, which will be broadcast live Indosiar, will be held at the Kanjempuan Stadium in Malang Regency, Friday (08/11).
Currently, Madura United are in second place in the standings, with a collection of 44 points from 26 matches. Meanwhile, Arema is ranked sixth standings with 38 points from 25 matches.

How did Rasiman measure the power of Arema this season? See below.
